title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 550.7 - Scope of rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 550.7 - Scope of rules

State Regulations
(a) The following rules and the forms referred to therein (including the
instructions on said forms) shall be statewide in application unless otherwise
specifically stated. (b) Special
rules pertaining to specific pools, fields, or areas will be issued when
required and shall prevail over the statewide rules if in conflict
therewith. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
550.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
